title: Why does broccoli smell so bad?
description:
What's that smell? It's broccoli! In this episode you'll get a new appreciation for broccoli, learn who invented it, how to make it taste good, and even find out how to make it not smell so bad! You'll journey from ancient Rome to America on a time-bending adventure with broccoli! 
Join our Who Smarted? community at www.Facebook.com/WhoSmarted.  And get the free study guide at www.whosmarted.com.  
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
